doc.title: Fairy Folio: A Field Guide to the Faerie
doc.plot: If you thought fairies were all about kindness and granting wishes... think again. This animated field guide introduces us the the REAL fairies of folklore. Sometimes benevolent, sometimes nasty... always unpredictable. From temperamental house-fairies like Brownies to murderous Goblins like the Red-Cap and true monsters like the Nuckelavee, the true fairies of folklore have little in common with the Tinkerbells of children's fiction. Fairy Folio shows gives crucial information for handling oneself in an encounter with these mystical beings; as well as giving us insights into their history and possible origins.
